subject: Baseball
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Halsey, who was said to die in a fall, pitched for three teams, including the Yankees, and gave up Barry Bonds’s 714th career home run in 2006.
snippet: Halsey, who was said to die in a fall, pitched for three teams, including the Yankees, and gave up Barry Bonds’s 714th career home run in 2006.
